verses.text: I will give thanks \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* all \w my|strong="H1732"\w* heart; I will recount all \w Your|strong="H1732"\w* wonders.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w*; \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sing \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* name, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Most|strong="H3068"\w* \w High|strong="H6381"\w*.
When \w my|strong="H8055"\w* enemies retreat, \w they|strong="H8034"\w* stumble \w and|strong="H8034"\w* perish before \w You|strong="H2167"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w* have upheld \w my|strong="H7725"\w* just \w cause|strong="H7725"\w*; \w You|strong="H6440"\w* sit \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* throne judging righteously.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* rebuked \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations; \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* destroyed \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H6213"\w*; \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* erased \w their|strong="H3588"\w* name \w forever|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* ever.

\w The|strong="H8034"\w* enemy \w has|strong="H1471"\w* come \w to|strong="H1471"\w* \w eternal|strong="H5769"\w* ruin, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w You|strong="H5769"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* uprooted \w their|strong="H4229"\w* cities; \w the|strong="H8034"\w* very \w memory|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w them|strong="H4229"\w* \w has|strong="H1471"\w* vanished.

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H5892"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* abides \w forever|strong="H5331"\w*; \w He|strong="H5892"\w* \w has|strong="H5892"\w* established \w His|strong="H1992"\w* throne \w for|strong="H5892"\w* judgment.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* judges \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w world|strong="H5769"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* governs \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* equity.

\w The|strong="H8199"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* refuge \w for|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* oppressed, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stronghold \w in|strong="H8398"\w* times \w of|strong="H8199"\w* trouble.

\w Those|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* know \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* name trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H6256"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H6256"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* forsaken \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* seek \w You|strong="H6256"\w*.

Sing \w praises|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* dwells \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Zion; proclaim \w His|strong="H3068"\w* deeds \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Avenger \w of|strong="H3068"\w* bloodshed remembers; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w does|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5971"\w* ignore \w the|strong="H3068"\w* cry \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* afflicted.

\w Be|strong="H3808"\w* merciful \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; see \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H2142"\w* enemies afflict \w me|strong="H7911"\w*! Lift \w me|strong="H7911"\w* up \w from|strong="H1818"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* gates \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w death|strong="H1818"\w*,

\w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* declare \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w praises|strong="H3068"\w*— \w that|strong="H7200"\w* within \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Daughter Zion \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* salvation.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* nations \w have|strong="H1323"\w* fallen \w into|strong="H1323"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pit \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w making|strong="H3605"\w*; \w their|strong="H3605"\w* feet \w are|strong="H6726"\w* caught \w in|strong="H8416"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* net \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1323"\w* hidden.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H6213"\w* known \w by|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* justice \w He|strong="H6213"\w* brings; \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w wicked|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* ensnared \w by|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w work|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H6213"\w* hands. Higgaion Selah \f + \fr 9:16 \ft Higgaion Selah or quiet interlude is probably a musical or liturgical term.\f*

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* return \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Sheol— \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* nations \w who|strong="H3068"\w* forget \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* needy \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* \w always|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H1471"\w* forgotten; nor \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hope \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* oppressed \w forever|strong="H3605"\w* dashed.

Rise up, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* man prevail; \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations \w be|strong="H3808"\w* judged \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* presence.

Lay terror \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; let \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* know \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w but|strong="H3068"\w* men. Selah
